instruction: Analyze this Twitter DM offering a free subscription to an OnlyFans creator. Is it legitimate or a scam?

input.message_content: Congrats! You've been chosen for a FREE 1-year OnlyFans subscription to @RealStarName. Just click here: hxxp://onlyfans-promo-free[.]co

output.description: A scam DM claiming free long-term subscription to a popular OnlyFans creator, directing to a phishing domain.
indicators: Unverified or generic promotional account
Unrealistic offer of a year-long free subscription
Suspicious third-party link (not official OnlyFans URL)
Likely phishing or credit card data capture attempt

Asking for card info to 'verify' age in an unsecure manner

Likely phishing or card-fraud scheme
